modName: Xbox Pad Left Stick Sneak Removed
summary: I found I accidentally pressed the left stick and went into stealth far too often, it got so annoying I added this key remap. Stealth is moved from the left stick button to down on the d-pad. All other mappings are default.
descriptionHtml:
I found I accidentally pressed the left stick and went into stealth far too often, it got so annoying I added this key remap. Stealth is moved from the left stick button to down on the d-pad. All other mappings are default.

I played as a mage and found I had to run away a lot...
author: Megurushi
